DOC.brief_summary: The changes of local pulmonary ventilation should be registered with an electric impedance tomography (EIT) before and after a dilatative tracheotomy. The hypothesis is that the EIT cannot show changes in local ventilation due to the tracheotomy.
DOC.brief_title: Electric Impedance Tomography Before and After Dilatative Tracheotomy
DOC.criteria: treatment on ICU indication for tracheotomy age between 18 and 85 years written to consent severe chronic pulmonary disease cardio pulmonary unstable situation
